type: Tutorial Step - Fire Up the Machine!

definition.text: Now it's time to fire up your Data Tasks operation.

paragraphs.text: Select Run All Project Data Tasks on the menu.
We'll give it a few minutes to catch up with the present time. Remember, all indicators must get to 100% before we can start trading!
If you're getting a bit anxious, feel free to go down the Data Tasks section and check the status of the process instances!
